## Source: amazon-inspector (4a4c9eb38abc668e7c9332e8d230efe3435594c7d8d0b82695d2cfcbdb087a93)
The package elf-stats-twinkling-ribbon-344 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5f610be527e0e607850bc953e32fae4c393445ae30fb37e7f81fbe7275a8b93f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-twinkling-ribbon-344' @ 2.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
